pluggable.name: Page Dropdown
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: A different way of looking at pagination.

help.value:
Using this is less than straightforward, though someday it may be a drop-in replacement for Theme::page_selector.

Until then, to show a dropdown of all page numbers that redirects to the selected page, call <php $theme->page_dropdown(); ?>.

Currently, this will not work without javascript enabled in the browser.
